Plot: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.
Title: Oz the Great and Powerful
Writer: Mitchell Kapner (screenplay), David Lindsay-Abaire (screenplay), Mitchell Kapner (screen story), L. Frank Baum ("Oz" works)
Actors: James Franco, Mila Kunis, Rachel Weisz, Michelle Williams
